channel.title: Music on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Silence Speaks

item.title: Fooling With Famitracker
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Here are two tracks I made in FamiTracker that I’m actually a bit proud of! They were probably written back in 2011. You can check out the raw .ftm file here, which you would open in Famitracker to see all of the notes laid out. Same as above, you can check out the .ftm file here.

item.title: Out Of Sync
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: I heard the song Held within your heart And gave my best To play its leading part. But I could neither Determine the key, Nor predict Its syncopated beat.
